MCHS Sports Almanac

A long letter from home to those away.

Independence & Affiliation Notice

The MCHS Sports Almanac is an independent historical and statistical archive. It is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or operated in coordination with Meade County High School, Meade County Schools, or any associated athletic department.

Data Use Notice

Historical data has been compiled, normalized, and structured by the MCHS Sports Almanac project, led by K. David Mitchner, Jr.

Reuse is permitted. Attribution is requested, along with a link back to the Almanac.

Programs

  • GWBB — Greenwave Boys Basketball

Launch Status

Initial site scaffolding is live. Next: JSON exports for seasons 2011–12 through 2024–25.
